          <title>
            <string language="en">The normal line</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die normale Zeile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La ligne normale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A linha normal</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κανονική γραμμή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La línea normal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the normal line as the line perpendicular to the edge of a prism.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">prism</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die normale Zeile als die 
Zeile Senkrechtes zum Rand eines Prismas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la ligne normale comme 
ligne perpendiculaire au bord d'un prisme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a linha normal como a 
linha perpendicular à borda de um prisma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la riga normale come 
la riga perpendicolare al bordo di un prisma.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κανονική γραμμή ως 
κάθετο γραμμών στην άκρη ενός πρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la línea normal 
como la línea perpendicular al borde de un prisma.</string>
          </description>
